Created an attachment (id=9226)
Log File

The full log leading up to the exception.

We encountered a similar exception in PartTabFolder -- our stack trace is
similar back to Perspective.onActivate

We am running on WinXP. The builds we are using are 3.0M8 and I20040413.

Here is a copy of the stack trace:

Created an attachment (id=10015)
The stack trace at the frame that did the comodification

I didn't indicate what led up to the bug. We had just launched a debug session
of a runtime-workspace. The runtime was still in the process of starting up and
had not yet shown the main window. The ConcurrentModificationException caused
the runtime-workspace session to terminate.

I set a access breakpoint on PartTabFolder.children and determined that our
part had caused an exception to be thrown while it was being made visible. I
have attached the stack trace at the frame where the concurrent modifications
happen.

All the code near the top of that stack trace has changed significantly since
this was filed. It is likely that this has been fixed, but it is hard to verify
without steps to reproduce. Since the stack trace isn't relevant anymore, I'm
going to close this.
